title: Beat Pendant Light - Wide Gold / Gold
body: The innovative and sophisticated look of the Beat Wide Pendant Light can virtually transform the ambiance of any room, hence its popularity as an interior piece. It provides direct ambient illumination, which is ideal for any residential or commercial application. The elongated shade rotates smoothly, letting you focus the light on a particular area or allows the light to create a soft, warm shade of lighting for the entire room. The classy black, white or gold finish of this Beat exudes a sensuous dramatic effect, highlighting the focal part of your living room, dining room, or bar. Whilst the interior has a beaten style gold affect, adding a Indian / Moroccan style finish The internal light source is hidden to promote a seamless, elegant appearance. It brings a glamorous contrast without confusing your room’s interior theme. It can stand on its own as a statement piece, or you can mix and match it with some of our other Beat range to liven up your favorite space.
